31  int prepare_statement(sqlite3_stmt * & stmt, std::string const & stmt_buffer) const;
32 
33  int bind_value(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const stmt_insert_col_index, std::string const & text_buffer) const;
34 
35  int bind_value(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const stmt_insert_col_index, int const int_to_insert) const;
36 
37  int bind_value(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const stmt_insert_col_index, double const double_to_insert) const;
38 
39  int bind_value(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const stmt_insert_col_index) const;
40 
41  int bind_value(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const stmt_insert_col_index, const bool value_to_insert) const;
42 
43  int bind_foreign_key(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const stmt_insert_col_index, int const int_to_insert) const;
44 
45  bool step_validity( int const rc ) const;
46 
47  int step_command(sqlite3_stmt * stmt) const;
48 
49  int reset_command(sqlite3_stmt * stmt) const;
50 
51  void begin_transaction() const;
52 
53  void commit_transaction() const;
54 
55  static std::string convert_text( const unsigned char * text );
56 
57  template< typename T >
58  std::vector< T > get_all_objects(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, std::function< T(sqlite3_stmt *) > cb) const {
59  std::vector< T > retVal;
60  if (m_db)
61  {
62  while(step_command(stmt) == SQLITE_ROW)
63  {
64  retVal.push_back(cb(stmt));
65  }
66  }
67  return retVal;
68  }
69 
70  template< typename T >
71  T get_object(sqlite3_stmt * stmt, int const id, std::function< T(sqlite3_stmt *) > cb) const {
72  if (m_db) {
73  bind_value(stmt, 1, id );
74  int rc = step_command(stmt);
75  step_validity(rc);
76  if( rc == SQLITE_ROW ) {
77  T retVal = cb(stmt);
78  reset_command(stmt);
79  return retVal;
80  }
81  reset_command(stmt);
82  throw std::runtime_error("Invalid command during get_object");
83  }
84  throw std::runtime_error("No valid database connection");
85  }
86 
87 private:
88  sqlite3 * m_connection = nullptr;
89  std::shared_ptr<sqlite3> m_db;
90 
91 };

161  inline bool isDefaultMaterial(const int id, std::size_t const defaultMaterialsSize) {
162  return static_cast<std::size_t>(id) <= defaultMaterialsSize;
